overview: Patricia Gottesman is a media strategist who advises content and distribution companies on profitable growth. Before starting her own consulting practice, Gottesman developed and managed the Optimum brand family of digital TV, broadband and voice products for Cablevision Systems Corporation, one of the top cable MSO’s and content companies in the US. Gottesman hired and managed Cablevision’s product development, product management, marketing and interactive advertising organizations during a 28-year tenure with the cable giant. Gottesman’s current client roster includes the nation’s largest cable MSO and content provider, a major audience measurement and targeted advertising firm, one of the cable and satellite industries’ largest and most successful TV network families and an assortment of tech start-ups in Silicon Valley, London and India.
